news.title: 特朗普宣布将全球关税提高至15%
news.title0: Trump says he will increase his new global tariffs to 15%
news.content: 美国最高法院裁定特朗普关税违宪后，特朗普宣布将依据另一法案，对几乎所有进口商品征收15%的全球关税。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has said that he will impose global tariffs of 15%, as he continued to rail against a Supreme Court ruling that struck down his previous import taxes.
news.author: BBC

news.title: NASA登月任务因火箭问题再次推迟
news.title0: Nasa astronauts' moon mission delayed due to rocket issue
news.content: NASA宣布，原定3月6日发射的“阿尔忒弥斯2号”载人绕月任务因火箭氦气系统问题推迟，人类重返月球计划遇阻。
news.content0: Nasa has said that its 6 March launch day for its long-awaited lunar mission is now "out of consideration", after it spotted several last minute issues during routine checks that would prevent lift off.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普政府数小时内解雇刚获任命的检察官
news.title0: Trump administration fires Virginia prosecutor hours after judges appointed him
news.content: 弗吉尼亚州法官小组刚任命亨德利为联邦检察官数小时后，特朗普政府便将其解雇，引发司法任命权之争。
news.content0: The Trump administration has fired a top prosecutor in Virginia just hours after judges hired him.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 法国极左翼因学生被杀案陷入政治困境
news.title0: Killing of nationalist student leaves French far left in deep trouble as elections loom
news.content: 一名民族主义学生在里昂被疑似极左翼分子杀害，导致法国极左翼政党“不屈法国”面临巨大舆论压力，可能改变法国政治格局。
news.content0: Is the far left about to replace the far right as the pariah of French politics?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巨型陆龟时隔近200年重返加拉帕戈斯岛屿
news.title0: Giant tortoises return to Galápagos island after nearly 200 years
news.content: 158只人工繁育的巨型陆龟被放归加拉帕戈斯群岛的弗洛雷阿纳岛，这是该岛本土龟种灭绝180多年后的首次回归。
news.content0: Giant tortoises are roaming the Galápagos island of Floreana for the first time in more than 180 years, in what conservationists have called a "hugely significant milestone".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大枪击案嫌犯ChatGPT账户半年前被封
news.title0: Tumbler Ridge suspect's ChatGPT account banned before shooting
news.content: OpenAI在加拿大大规模枪击案发生半年前，因滥用检测封禁了嫌犯的ChatGPT账户，但当时未达到向当局报警的阈值。
news.content0: OpenAI banned a ChatGPT account owned by the suspect of a mass shooting in British Columbia more than half a year before the attack took place.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国东北部将迎暴风雪，纽约发布暴雪预警
news.title0: Blizzard warnings expand as blockbuster nor’easter takes aim at New York City, Northeast
news.content: 一场强东北风暴将袭击美国东北部，纽约、波士顿等大城市将面临暴雪、强风和可能出现的暴风雪天气。
news.content0: A high-impactnor’easteris about to crush parts of the Northeast with blizzard conditions, heavy snow and strong winds.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国男子冰球队距“冰上奇迹”后首金仅一步之遥
news.title0: Team USA is one game away from its first gold medal in men’s hockey since the ‘Miracle on Ice.’ That team still inspires
news.content: 美国男子冰球队将在奥运决赛中对阵加拿大，若获胜将是自1980年“冰上奇迹”后首次夺得该项目金牌。
news.content0: If Team USA is looking for inspiration ahead of the men’s Olympic hockey final Sunday against fierce rivals Canada, it need look no further than the iconic exploits of the “Miracle on Ice” heroes from 1980.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 朝鲜展示金正恩驾驶移动火箭发射车
news.title0: North Korea shows Kim Jong Un at the wheel of a mobile rocket launcher
news.content: 朝鲜官媒发布金正恩驾驶核能力移动火箭发射车的照片，称其为全球同类武器中最强大的之一。
news.content0: North Korea’s Kim Jong Un took the wheel of a nuclear-capable multiple rocket launcher at a ceremony in the capital Pyongyang, according to the country’s state media, and touted the weapon as among the most powerful of its type in the world.
news.author: CNN
